sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Lilo-&lilo-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout:
sh from the bash package
as86 from the bin86 package ld86 from the bin86 package
as from the binutils package ld from the binutils package strip from the binutils package
cp from the fileutils package dd from the fileutils package ln from the fileutils package mv from the fileutils package
cc from the gcc package
make from the make package
sed from the sed package
cat from the textutils package
